ISSUE.TITLE: Docs sidebar icon improvements
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Chore ## Describe the chore - GraphQL icon seems broken, attaching new one. ![Screenshot 2023-10-11 at 19 11 24](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/9a229ca9-d47f-4158-93e3-ce11da919ab0) - Generally we rounded our icon set to fit better with the Feather icons set, and we made them subtly more balanced, but we havent yet updated some of the icons in the sidebar. I marked which ones need updating on the screenshot below. - A divider is missing before the _Resources_ section. ## Additional context Add any other context or screenshots that help clarify the task. ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/8edc0c65-e3a3-44e4-88c0-a2f2a79f70eb) New icons below: ![CLI-commands](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/1f5f1d55-bd93-4ea7-b162-3c200e5bf480) ![CLI](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/dc84717b-4fa6-4940-b38a-279938410c08) ![database](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/9faef6eb-9ff9-4876-8898-02b8791e3406) ![edge-functions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/7676c64c-e6b7-45e3-8809-6435024dcc11) ![getting-started](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/47ced44b-a95f-46ab-a8c7-628a2db5c8bc) ![graphQL](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/846a9c40-891a-4030-a1e5-515f42da2455) ![Guides](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/9276c9c4-b72a-4449-ba91-c188ba4a90f6) ![home](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/664e85ee-84c0-47ff-b442-406b54152673) ![integrations](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/c6f8da8b-bcdc-4807-b57f-9be7b9ad20f6) ![management-API](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/e8b7c75c-f399-4124-b72e-f1905c3923db) ![platform](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/f6a7a254-ee7b-4bfd-a2e8-93df4e106456) ![realtime](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/90f6487f-1e86-4027-9826-1b3f2d895191) ![self-hosting](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/46031252/e0a90748-b8c7-4870-a789-015550fe9c07)
